subject: Re: [junit] JFCUnit with modal dialogs
msgSnippet: Nevermind, sorry... I just needed enterClickAndLeave(this,okButton,250L); Thanks. ... From: Norman Kabir  To:
messageBody:
Nevermind, sorry...

I just needed
enterClickAndLeave(this,okButton,250L);

Thanks.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Norman Kabir" <nkabir@...>
To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 04, 2001 3:44 PM
Subject: [junit] JFCUnit with modal dialogs


> What is the appropriate way to test modal dialog requests? The modal
dialog
> will block the main thread--I'm testing a class that uses JOptionPane
> dialogs.
>
> I'm not certain if I should simply test everything independently or if
> there's a way to integrate the UI components (modal/non-modal) and test
them
> as a single unit.
>
> Thanks.
>
> Cheers,
> --Norm
